command_name.name: Command Name
command_name.desc: The name of the process you want to monitor.

ps_command.name: The Process Status (ps) Command
ps_command.desc: The command with options. The default works on most systems.

ps_regex.name: The regex used to match a command name.
ps_regex.desc: By default, this matches a command name anywhere in the ps output line.  The word COMMAND get's replaced with the command you gave (regex escaped).  You may wish to try the following pattern if you only want to match a command in the last column:  (?i:COMMAND\s+$)

alert_when_command_not_found.name: Alert when command not found
alert_when_command_not_found.desc: Specifies if an error is reported when no commands are found.  Use 0 to disable alert.
